com.serena.dmclient.objects
Interface ReleaseTemplateRule

All Superinterfaces:
DimensionsObject
public interface ReleaseTemplateRule
extends DimensionsObject

Represents a Dimensions Release Template Rule.

A release template rule details the part, part variant, item type (or group of item types), and release subdirectory that are used to determine which items are selected when creating a release.

Note:

  1. Use the special Dimensions Item Type ("*") to define a rule that affects all item types in the product.
  2. Use the special Dimensions Item Type ("-") to specify that the template rule is not applied to any item (inhibits the selection of items for a sub-tree of the design part structure).
  3. Use the special Dimensions Part Id ("*") to define a rule that affects all design parts for which no specific item type rule exists. The definition of a default rule in a template ensures that all design parts within a baselined design structure are considered for inclusion in the release.
  4. Use the special Dimensions Variant ("*") to define a rule that affects all design part variants.

    Method Summary
     java.lang.String getItemTypeGroup()
              Returns the item type name or the user-defined item group name used by the rule.
     java.lang.String getPartId()
              Returns the design part Id used by the rule.
